channel.title: Hai I got a question not a problem :D
channel.description: Hi im am running a 517 and want to know how to add a yellow arrow above a npcs head such as barrows brothers and make it so only the person that spawns the npc such as dharocks can only attack dharocks. Thank you

item.title: Hai I got a question not a problem :D
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

What your describing is a Hint Arrow and I don’t know if there was a tutorial ever released for a hint arrow for 517 but I know 508, 525, and most of the higher protocols have them.
Try searching “517 hint arrow” or w.e protocol your using.

Read full topic
item.source: Hai I got a question not a problem :D
